Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at BelleVue Belsana in Felanitx (Portocolom), you'll be close to Vall d'Or Golf. This hotel is within the vicinity of Cala Domingo Beach and Cala d'Or Marina.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 70 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Guests may use a shuttle from the hotel to the airport for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Vall d'Or Golf - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Cala Domingo Beach - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Cala d'Or Marina - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Cala Antena Beach - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Cala Mondrago Beach - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi
Cala Varques - 10 km / 6.2 mi
Cala Figuera Port - 12.3 km / 7.6 mi
Cala Santany Beach - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi
Caves of Drach - 14.8 km / 9.2 mi
Punta de N'Amer Watch Tower - 21.7 km / 13.5 mi
Cala Millor Beach - 22.8 km / 14.2 mi
Es Trenc Beach - 25.5 km / 15.8 mi
Cala Agulla Beach - 38 km / 23.6 mi
Golf Son Gual - 42.8 km / 26.6 mi
Maioris Golf Club - 43.5 km / 27 mi

The preferred airport for BelleVue Belsana is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 48 km / 29.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
